description: This file defines an interface `IOmiProxy` within the `omi` namespace. The interface provides methods for mounting and unmounting crypted bundles, as well as registering and unregistering error listeners. It appears to serve as a wrapper around an omi_dbus_api, enabling simpler method calls and signal handling for external components. The file includes licensing information, include guards, and reference to standard library headers `string` and `functional`.

classes.name: IOmiProxy
classes.description: Interface class providing methods to interact with omi_dbus_api, including mounting/unmounting crypted bundles and handling error listeners.

methods.name: mountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Mounts a crypted bundle given an identifier and file paths, outputs the bundle path, returns success as boolean.

methods.name: umountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Unmounts a crypted bundle identified by its ID, returns success as boolean.

methods.name: registerListener
methods.description: Registers an error listener callback, returns a listener ID (tag).

methods.name: unregisterListener
methods.description: Unregisters a listener based on its ID (tag).

ctags.name: OmiErrorListener
ctags.pattern: /^    typedef std::function<void(const std::string&, ErrorType, const void*)> OmiErrorListener;$/
